name: Technamo
tagline: Virginia Niche Agile IT Service Provider
description:
Technamo is a niche IT service provider, focused on custom application development, cloud computing, legacy modernization, integration and IT management services to its clients.
TECHNAMO founded by a team of highly qualified and experienced information technology executives with sound technical expertise and the right mix of business knowledge, focused on providing cloud computing IT Solutions & Services to government, non-profit and commercial companies.

locations.address: II Floor, Plot No 245, Sri Sai Square, Phase II Kamalapuri Colony
